metadata.title: CVE-2023-5256 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In certain scenarios, Drupal's JSON:API module will output errorbacktraces. With some configurations, this may cause sensitive informationto be cached and made available to anonymous users, leading to privilegeescalation. This vulnerability only affects sites with the JSON:API moduleenabled, and can be mitigated by uninstalling JSON:API. The core REST andcontributed GraphQL modules are not affected.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
